content:
Has anyone tried deriving vital signs profiles based on https://simplifier.net/Simplifier.Core.R4.Profiles/~packages?

Just to get started I tried deriving Bodyweight in Forge, but it doesn't seem right. I've attached some screenshots to show what I mean. (one of the profile that seems strange and one where it seems ok)
bloodpressure_screenshot.PNG BodyWeight_screenshot.PNG

The same thing can be seen on Simplifier: https://simplifier.net/simplifier.core.r4.profiles/observation-bodyweight

I am kind of a noob at this, but it seems like the vital signs profiles in the Core.R4-package on Simplifier are invalid?

Hi Stephan, thanks for reporting. I'm checking this with Simplifier lead developer @Martijn Harthoorn and Forge lead developer @Michel Rutten . There have been slicing updates and we looking to update the core packages indeed, but I'm sure they'll have a better assessment.
FYI this issue seems to be solved in the latest Forge R4 22.1 release. Simplifier will be updated at a later time and this should also fix the online rendering.
I can confirm that with R4 22.1 release of Forge it looks alright. Thanks to @Michel Rutten for helping out!
